text: Tomás Maya Giraldo (12 September 1996) is a footballer from Colombia who plays as a left back for Cúcuta Deportivo. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Categoría Primera B players Category:Atlético Nacional footballers Category:Leones F.C. footballers Category:Deportivo Pasto footballers Category:Atlético Huila footballers Category:Independiente Santa Fe footballers Category:Cúcuta Deportivo footballers Category:Footballers from Medellín
title: Tomás Maya
